name: SUSTAIN Lipstick
about: What it is: A clean and vegan, rich and creamy ultra-pigmented lipstick with a satin finish..Formulation Type: Lipstick..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Shea Butter: Provides a soft, buttery texture to the lips...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Lipsticks that honor Indigenous traditions and give back to Indigenous communities, named after the word for earth or land in one of the Indigenous languages. SUSTAIN Lipstick comes housed in a premium, refillable component, and the ingredients are sustainably sourced...
ingredients: -Shea Butter: Provides a soft, buttery texture to the lips...Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Brassica Glycerides, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Kaolin, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Caprylate...May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean, dry lips and build as needed for more color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know it's technically a satin finish but I find it looks more matte to me, which I love, every matte Lipstick I've tried in the past is extremely drying. This stuff lasts for hours on end and I love the shade with my complexion! My new go to ud83dude0d
